About Me

BIO

Born In The DR.Congo, raised in Kinshasa which is the capitol where I attended my primary and secondary education and graduated High school In 2014. Moved In to the US In 2014 to pursue my higher eduaction. I'm holding an A.S degree in computer science and two years of experience in challenging development environments. I have an excellent communication and organizational abilities with a resourceful approach to solving diverse problems. I'm Deadline-driven and knowledgeable with a strong desire to learn and contribute to a team.

Freelancing

Full Stack Developer

I started freelancing as a full stack web developer for over a year and I really enjoy it because it's pretty flexible like I can work from home and set up my own time. I have worked with great customer and help them with my services
